summary: The video features a man in a suit delivering a speech in French. He discusses the significant breakthrough achieved by 'Le Rassemblement National,' highlighting its historical importance. The speaker criticizes alliances made by Emmanuel Macron and Gabriel Attal with far-left formations, which he claims have deprived the French people of a policy of recovery that was widely supported. He mentions the party's strong performance in European elections and the first round of the presidential election, securing nearly 34% of the votes. The speaker expresses concern over electoral agreements that favor the far-left, led by Jean-Luc Mélenchon. He concludes with a promise to be with the people until victory, emphasizing the start of a new era and the hope that has been rekindled among the populace. The speech ends with patriotic sentiments, wishing long life to France and the Republic.
keywords: Le Rassemblement National, Emmanuel Macron, Gabriel Attal, extrême-gauche, Jean-Luc Mélenchon, redressement, élections européennes, premier tour, 34%, accords électoraux, victoire, France, République
